item.description: TODO: Proofread and align with clean sanksrit text. वेदान्तसारः भगवद्रामानुजकृतः VEDANTASĀRA OF BHAGAVAD RĀMĀNUJA EDITED BY PANDIT V. KRISHNAMACHARYA WITH English Translation by SRI M. B. NARASIMHA AYYANGAR, M.Sc. THE ADYAR LIBRARY 1953 ० १ PREFACE THE Vedantasara is an easy and concise commentary on the Brahmasutras of Badarāyaṇa who is believed to be identical with Vyasa, the famous author of the Mahābhārata. The Vedantasara was written by Bhagavad Ramanuja (1017 to 1137 A.
